location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Map of the Arabian Coast from Hiswa Mukaidthir to Makatin'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on Paper with Coloured InkDimensions: 730mm x 1030mm

mods.abstract: The map shows the coastline and littoral region around the British Protectorate of Aden.The location of villages, wells, aqueducts, paths and roads are all marked on the map as well as lines marking the borders of British-controlled territory and the territory of local tribes.
